CustomField.formula: IF( OR( Type__c = "Subtractive & Past Due", Type__c = "Additive Only & Past Due", Type__c = "T-3 Days Out", Type__c = "Additive Job Past Due" ), "standard:scheduling_constraint", IF( OR( Type__c = "Top 20 Customer", Type__c = "Bad Outcomes - Order Bad Outcome", Type__c = "MQ > $ Threshold", Type__c = "Expired", Type__c = "Created in ERP", Type__c = "Bad Outcomes - Job Bad Outcome", Type__c = "Created in ERP", Type__c = "Expedited", Type__c = "Rejected Part", Type__c = "MQ w/ Custom Finish", Type__c = "Non-Standard Inspection", Type__c = "SPOC Supplier", Type__c = "Top Quality Account", Type__c = "> Additive Job Value Threshold" ), "standard:problem", IF( Type__c = "POD", "standard:checkout", "" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Icon indicator type
